name: aliquot
content:
aliquot noun [C]
(PART)
Add to word list
Add to word list
science
  specialized an amount taken from a larger quantity, so that it can be tested, etc.: After centrifugation, aliquots of serum were frozen at -70°C until analysis.

aliquot noun [C]
(NUMBER)
mathematics
  specialized a quantity that can be divided into another quantity an exact number of times
